main event: Radar detected the form of a big disc near Moscow, USSR, which descended in a spiral at a low altitude and then rose vertically.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object was detected by radar,The radar identified it as a big disc,The object was reported to be a Soviet aircraft with a red wing,It was mentioned as having good stability and maneuverability in the air.
witness description: Eyewitnesses stated the object had the form of a big disk.
